assessment_item.title: 7QNHTRQ16 சவ்வு வடிகட்டிகள்_______ ஆனது?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

சவ்வு வடிகட்டிகள்_______ ஆனது?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

செல்லுலோஸ் அசிட்டேட்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1708"},{"text":"

டையமேட்டிஸ் எர்த்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1718"},{"text":"

ஆஸ்பெஸ்டாஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1723"},{"text":"

கண்ணாடி

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1728"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7QNHTRQ16 சவ்வு வடிகட்டிகள்_______ ஆனது?","title":"7QNHTRQ16 சவ்வு வடிகட்டிகள்_______ ஆனது?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
